item.title: üçû N¬∞29 ‚Äî Koji
item.description: I’ve been wanting to make the Koji bread from Tartine Book No. 3 for a little while now. Where did this come from? I had some Koji sitting in the freezer (probably for too long) from when I first made garum well over a year ago. This past summer, in the middle of the pandemic, I got interested in the Koji again and made some smoked rice amazake that I then made into mouse and ice cream.
